channel.title: Comments on: 21 Misunderstandings of Calvinism: Introduction (part 1)

item.title: By: Craig
item.dc:creator: Craig
item.description: Excellent introductory comments Dr. Sam. Many Arminians assume that Hyper-Calvinism is true Calvinism. They must be taught this is not so. Also tt does no good, in debates, to accuse people of position they should hold, logically, but do not.
item.content:encoded: Excellent introductory comments Dr. Sam. Many Arminians assume that Hyper-Calvinism is true Calvinism. They must be taught this is not so. Also tt does no good, in debates, to accuse people of position they should hold, logically, but do not.
